posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: May 20, 2019 at 5:36 AM#6so normally when a fixture is hung the opposite direction from how it was programmed using previs, you can swap the fixture profile from the desk. christian jackson has avideoexplaining it, but essentially you just reverse the addresses for the fixtures instances.this situation may be a bit different, however, in that you have multiple tilt instances (odd), but in theory it should still work if you just swap the addresses for the tilt attributes to correspond to how they are hung in real life. alternatively, most fixtures will have a menu option to reverse pixel/tilt when this is possible (x4 20 bar, chorus line 16, colorforces)
